caption.p: Simplified conceptual model of the possible contributions of adoptive cytomegalovirus (CMV)â€“specific T-cell therapy to posttransplantation anti-CMV immunity. All cell types mentioned in the graphs represent CMV-specific T cells. Abbreviations: ATC, adoptive T-cell therapy with cytomegalovirus-specific T cells; ATG, antithymocyte globulin; CMI, cell-mediated immunity; CMV, cytomegalovirus; HSCTx, hematopoietic stem cell transplantation.
